hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Update code via Git. ansible mm -m git -a \ "repo=ssh://geerlingguy@git.midwesternmac.com/home/geerlingguy/git/drupal7.git \ dest=/home/geerlingguy/domains/drupal7 \ version=master \ update=yes"
# Run database updates, then clear caches. ansible mm -a "drush --root=/home/geerlingguy/domains/drupal7 --uri=www.midwesternmac.com updb -y" ansible mm -a "drush --root=/home/geerlingguy/domains/drupal7 --uri=www.midwesternmac.com cc all"
